00034 enum TBTDiscoverabilityMode
00035     {
00036     // This values are defined in the BT Core specs
00037     EBTDiscModeHidden  = 0x02,   
00038     EBTDiscModeGeneral = 0x03,   
00039 
00041     EBTDiscModeTemporary = 0x100 
00042     };
00043 
00045 enum TBTSearchMode
00046     {
00047     EBTSearchModeGeneral,
00048     EBTSearchModeLimited
00049     };
00050 
00051 enum TBTSapMode
00052     {
00053     EBTSapDisabled,
00054     EBTSapEnabled
00055     };
00056 
00057 // SDP UUID Constants - Short form
00058 // Taken from Bluetooth Profile specification v1.1
00059 // These are used when registering the service to
00060 // local SDP database and when searching the service
00061 // information from remote device.
00062 const TUint KBTSdpDun                   = 0x1103;
00063 const TUint KBTSdpGenericTelephony      = 0x1204;
00064 const TUint KBTSdpFax                   = 0x1111;
00065 const TUint KBTSdpObjectPush            = 0x1105;
00066 const TUint KBTSdpFileTransfer          = 0x1106;
00067 const TUint KBTSdpHeadSet               = 0x1108;
00068 const TUint KBTSdpHandsfree             = 0x111e;
00069 const TUint KBTSdpHeadsetAudioGateway   = 0x1112;
00070 const TUint KBTSdpHandsfreeAudioGateway = 0x111f;
00071 const TUint KBTSdpGenericAudio          = 0x1203;
00072 const TUint KBTSdpGenericNetworking     = 0x1201;
00073 const TUint KBTSdpBasicImaging          = 0x111b;
00074 const TUint KBTSdpBasicPrinting         = 0x1120;
00075 const TUint KBTSdpSap                   = 0x112d;
00076 const TUint KBTSdpAudioSource           = 0x110a;
00077 
00078 // Security manager Uids
00079 // These are used when registering/deregistering
00080 // service to Security Manager.
00081 // (These are identical to SDP constants but
00082 // the meaning is not the same.)
00083 
00084 const TUint KBTSecurityUidFax                   = 0x1111;
00085 const TUint KBTSecurityUidDun                   = 0x1103;
00086 const TUint KBTSecurityUidObjectPush            = 0x1105;
00087 const TUint KBTSecurityUidFileTransfer          = 0x1106;
00088 const TUint KBTSecurityUidHandsfreeAudioGateway = 0x111F;
00089 const TUint KBTSecurityUidHeadsetAudioGateway   = 0x1112;
00090 
00091 //HF attribute ID
00092 const TUint KBTHFSupportedFeatures        = 0x0311;
00093 const TUint KBTHSRemoteAudioVolumeControl = 0x0302;
00094 
00095 //HW specific attributes
00096 const TUint KBTHFDeviceModelNumber              = 0x0300;
00097 const TUint KBTHFHWVersionNumber                    = 0x0301;
00098 const TUint KBTHFSWVersionNumber                    = 0x0302;
